Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz host the Memphis Grizzlies for the season opener.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Grizzlies -3; over/under is 227.5
Utah went 31-51 overall, 16-36 in Western Conference play and 21-20 at home during the 2023-24 season.
Memphis finished 27-55 overall and 14-37 in Western Conference games during the 2023-24 season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaren Jackson Jr.: day to day (hamstring), Luke Kennard: day to day (foot), Vince Williams Jr.: out (leg), GG Jackson II: out (foot ).
